desktop_question: Will your company hurt our town's economy?
mobile_question: Will your company hurt our town's economy?
desktop_content: No, We are here to make everything better.
mobile_content: No, We are here to make everything better.

desktop_question:
What are your company's plans to minimize any
negative environmental impact?
mobile_question:
What are your company's plans to minimize
any negative environmental impact?
desktop_content:
The environment is here for us to use in the fullest extent of
our abilities. There is no such thing as “negative” impact. Only impact.
mobile_content:
The environment is here for us to use in the
fullest extent of our abilities. There is no such
thing as “negative” impact. Only impact.

desktop_question:
How will your company contribute to the economic
development of our town and surrounding areas?
mobile_question:
How will your company contribute to the
economic development of our town and
surrounding areas?
desktop_content:
Each location varies. We have been in operation for
generations and have plenty of confidential community-specific
plans.
mobile_content:
Each location varies. We have been in
operation for generations and have plenty of
confidential community-specific plans.

desktop_question:
How will your company ensure that it is complying
with local laws and regulations?
mobile_question:
How will your company ensure that it is
complying with local laws and regulations?
desktop_content:
It’s possible that laws or regulations are violated because the
necessary measures of creating a thriving community are not
always conventional. Our success requires your trust.
mobile_content:
It’s possible that laws or regulations are
violated because the necessary measures of
creating a thriving community are not always
conventional. Our success requires your trust.

desktop_question:
Will your company create jobs for locals and help
our town grow?
mobile_question:
Will your company create jobs for locals
and help our town grow?
desktop_content:
Everything Corp has many plans for the future. The success
of these future plans are secure so long as they are concealed
from the particular location they are impacting.
mobile_content:
Everything Corp has many plans for the
future. The success of these future plans are
secure so long as they are concealed from the
particular location they are impacting.
